com.stickycoding.Rokon
Class Rokon

java.lang.Object
  com.stickycoding.Rokon.Rokon

public class Rokon
extends java.lang.Object

Version:
1.0.3
Author:
Richard Taylor - Sticky Coding See LICENSE for information about copyright. This engine was built to be open source, you arefree to use this in your projects, commercial or otherwise, as you wish. If you make any improvements, please send them on to me so everybody can benefit from them. Please report any bugs through the Issue tracker on google projects http://code.google.com/p/rokon/ http://stickycoding.com/rokon/ If this code has been useful, please spread the word, and consider donating to keep working on this worthwhile!

public void initVibrator()

                    int loops)

loops - number of loops
